name: Quantum Zoo! (David Mills - Game Developer!)
description:
In a time when space travel is common place, a futuristic zoo built along a meteor herd suffers a catastrophic incident... Solar flares fired out from across the galaxy have short circuited all the animal cages, and now the creatures are running wild!

Play as many different animals as you run amok in a fantasy space zoo!

Manipulate TIME ITSELF to get all 4 animals in each stage to an escape pod and return home!

Utilize other TIME based anomalies such as TIME BUBBLES and QUANTUM DEATH to solve puzzles and overcome obstacles!

Mow down bystanders, but watch out for the hunters who seek to stop you!

Gamepad and keyboard support!
